arStrings.szText:
{c_label}Cooldown: {/c}{c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c} seconds
Aldkin rains a {c_important}Fire Storm{/c} down from the sky that deals {c_number}{payload:IMPACT_DAMAGE_TOOLTIP}{/c} Fire damage on impact and remains on the ground for {c_number}{SF_4}{/c} seconds. Every second, the {c_important}Fire Storm{/c} Burns enemies within for {c_number}{dot:BURNING}{/c} damage over {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} seconds.

Enemies hit by {c_important}Fire Storm's{/c} impact or aftershocks have a {c_number}[{SF_11}*100|%|]{/c} chance to be Stunned for {c_number}[{buffduration:STUN}|1|]{/c} |4second;seconds.
